name: Koraidon
flavorText: This seems to be the Winged King mentioned in an old expedition journal. It was said to have split the land with its bare fists.

previous.name: Iron Valiant
previous.flavorText: It has some similarities to a mad scientist’s invention covered in a paranormal magazine.

next.name: Miraidon
next.flavorText: Much remains unknown about this creature. It resembles Cyclizar, but it is far more ruthless and powerful.
